Class ManagerController

java.lang.Object
services.controller.UserController
services.controller.ManagerController
public class ManagerController extends UserController
Controller class for HDB Managers. Allows managers to manage projects, approve/reject applications, handle enquiries, and generate reports.

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from class services.controller.UserController

    auth, filterSettings

  • Constructor Details

    • ManagerController

      public ManagerController()
      Default constructor.

    • ManagerController

      public ManagerController(IProjectApplicationService projectAppService, IProjectManagementService projectManagementService, IOfficerApplicationService officerApplicationService, IEnquiryService enquiryService, IReportPrintService printService)
      Constructs a ManagerController with custom service implementations. This constructor is intended for scenarios such as unit testing or advanced dependency injection, where mock or alternative service instances may be supplied.
      Parameters:
      projectAppService - Service responsible for handling project applications
      projectManagementService - Service responsible for creating, editing, and deleting BTO projects
      officerApplicationService - Service managing officer application workflows
      enquiryService - Service for managing public and project-specific enquiries
      printService - Service for generating downloadable project reports

  • Method Details

    • retreiveManager

      public HDBManager retreiveManager()
      Retrieves the currently logged-in user and casts it to an HDBManager. Also updates the manager's internal list of managed projects by fetching them from the ProjectDB using their NRIC.
      Returns:
      The current user as an HDBManager with managed projects loaded

    • start

      public void start(Scanner sc)
      Launches the main menu for the manager, allowing them to access key functionalities such as managing projects, applications, and reports. Handles exceptions gracefully to prevent session crashes.
      Specified by:
      start in class UserController
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner used to receive user input from the command line

    • manageChosenProject

      public void manageChosenProject(Scanner sc, BTOProject chosenProject) throws Exception
      Enters the management portal for a selected BTO project. This portal allows the manager to perform actions specific to the chosen project, such as viewing applicants, officer applications, and responding to enquiries.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      chosenProject - The project the manager wishes to manage
      Throws:
      Exception - if the management view fails to load

    • viewAllProjectList

      public void viewAllProjectList(Scanner sc) throws Exception
      Displays a read-only list of all available BTO projects in the system. The view respects current filter settings (e.g., by flat type or date). This is useful for managers to review system-wide project information.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      Throws:
      Exception - if project list fails to load or filtering errors occur

    • readOnlyProjectAction

      public void readOnlyProjectAction(Scanner sc, String projectName) throws Exception
      Opens a read-only portal for a specific project identified by its name. Allows the manager to inspect project details without making modifications.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      projectName - The name of the project to be viewed
      Throws:
      Exception - if the project cannot be found or viewed

    • manageMyProjects

      public void manageMyProjects(Scanner sc) throws Exception
      Displays the list of projects managed by the currently logged-in HDB Manager. Projects are filtered based on the system's current filter settings. This view is specifically tailored to the manager’s assigned projects.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      Throws:
      Exception - if no managed projects exist or view fails to load

    • viewProjectApplicationList

      public void viewProjectApplicationList(Scanner sc, BTOProject selectedProject)
      Displays a list of project applications for the selected project, and allows the manager to select one for approval or rejection.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      selectedProject - The selected BTO project

    • displayProjectApplicationAction

      public void displayProjectApplicationAction(Scanner sc, ProjectApplication selectedProjectApp, BTOProject selectedProject)
      Displays the appropriate action for a selected project application, depending on whether it is pending or requesting withdrawal.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      selectedProjectApp - The selected application
      selectedProject - The project related to the application

    • pendingProjectApplicationAction

      public void pendingProjectApplicationAction(Scanner sc, ProjectApplication selectedProjectApp, BTOProject selectedProject)
      Allows the manager to approve or reject a pending application.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      selectedProjectApp - The selected project application
      selectedProject - The BTO project

    • withdrawingProjectApplicationAction

      public void withdrawingProjectApplicationAction(Scanner sc, ProjectApplication selectedProjectApp, BTOProject selectedProject)
      Allows the manager to approve or reject a withdrawal request.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      selectedProjectApp - The application requesting withdrawal
      selectedProject - The BTO project

      selectedEnquiry - The enquiry to reply to
